features: 【Waterproof Nylon Fabric】This small sling bag is made of soft, durable and waterproof nylon fabric, preventing rainwater from soaking in; with wide and durable zippers with rope loops for easy grip, making it a reliable companion for your daily use.

【Sling Bag Size & Adjustable Strap】Mini sling crossbody bag size is 5.9"L x 1.2"W x 8.66"H, weight: 0.25IB. The wide nylon shoulder strap can be adjusted from 31'' to 55.1''.Suitable for different body types. You can adjust the strap according to fit to make your daily use more comfortable.

【Practical Capacity】This lightweight small sling bag has 1 main zip pocket and 1 front zip pocket. The main zip pocket contains 1 mesh inner pocket. Stay organised with multiple compartments. Enough capacity to hold power bank, ID cards, mobile phone, keys, cash, passport, earphones, etc.

【Multipurpose Sling Bag】This travel slim bag is suitable for both men and women and can be used as a small crossbody bag, chest bag, small waist pack, concept collective travel sling bag. Ideal for everyday use, running, hiking, cycling, camping, gym workouts, music festivals and more.

【Great Gift Idea】:This fashionable and versatile chest bag is great for all ages, boys, girls, adults, kids, seniors, men, women and teens. This mini sling bag is the perfect gift for any occasion such as Christmas, Valentine's Day, birthdays and anniversaries.

【What You Get】: Small sling bags and friendly customer service. If you're not satisfied or receive a defective product, please contact us immediately and we will provide you with satisfactory after-sales service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Small Sling Bag for Women and Men,Waterproof Nylon Cloth,Small But Roomy Crafted with waterproof materials, this small sling bag ensures the safety of your belongings even in unexpected weather conditions. The comfortable and adjustable wide strap allows for a customized fit, making it suitable for individuals of all sizes.Whether you're going for a casual walk, running errands, or traveling, this mini sling purse is a reliable companion.

Multiple Ways to Carry, Like Small Crossbody Purse, Mini Sling Bag, Mini Chest Bag, or Sports Waist Bags This small chest bag is great for all ages Boys, Girls, Adults, Kids, Seniors, Men, Women, and Teens.This mini sling bag makes the perfect gift for any occasion like Christmas, Valentine, birthdays, and anniversaries.

Warm Tips Note 1 : Colors on your computer monitor may differ slightly from actual product colors depending on your monitor settings.Note 2 : Please allow the smell in the course of packing and shipping, but it will be disappeared in a few days air out.Note 3 : Due to different producing batches, there may be deviation of 0.1--0.4 cm for items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My husband like it!
reviews.reviewText: I bought for my husband for work on days he has to be more active and puts his wallet and phone in. He liked it and says it’s so comfortable he didn’t take it out all day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and light and durable
reviews.reviewText: It was a gift and he love it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for summertime
reviews.reviewText: The only bad thing about summertime is the loss of coat pockets. As a man in NYC, it's always prudent to carry a few more items that most others might keep in their car as they drive around.I like having bags this size for the warmer months so I can keep my daily carry items without need of a backpack or coat.This one is totally fine, and if you like how it looks, grab it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Size for Traveling or on the Go!
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this mini sling bag for an upcoming trip to Japan, but I find myself using it all the time now. It's my first mini sling bag, and I love it. I take it with me when I go out, and it's super convenient. I no longer have to worry about misplacing my phone or wallet. It holds a lot of items like small electronics, fragrances, and important cards, making it perfect for travel or when I'm on the move. I use it daily and find it really comfortable to wear. Initially, I was concerned the strap might be bothersome, but it actually feels good on my chest, and sometimes I forget I'm even wearing it. Plus, it passed my accidental water test with flying colors, when I threw a glass of water at it, everything inside stayed dry! It's totally waterproof, so you can confidently stroll in the rain without your stuff getting wet. Highly recommended if you are in need of a sling bag that isn’t too big but a perfect size on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I needed
reviews.reviewText: It was small enough for a day trip.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Nice Over-The-Shoulder Bag when on the Go
reviews.reviewText: This over-the-shoulder bag is great for use when traveling, or for one-off occasions when you don't need, or want, to use a backpack or purse or want to try to stuff everything into your pockets.The material and construction feel like it should hold up to casual use for many years. With its size, I can easily hold my glasses, wallet, keys, phone, and still have room for other bits and bobbles.The strap works well enough to use either cross body or over the shoulder.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars quality sling bag for my cell phone and additional peripheals
reviews.reviewText: Being on the go, I was looking for a sling bag where I could carry my essential items. This one caught my eye as it is waterproof. It has multiple compartments and feels like one never runs out of space. It has sturdy zipper. It is made of quality real leather. Great purchase at an affordable price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little sling bag
reviews.reviewText: Just the right size for a wallet and a phone a few little extras. Nice quality.
